articles.description: India is struggling to convince its health and front-line workers to take a homegrown COVID-19 vaccine controversially approved without late-stage efficacy data, government data showed https://dashboard.cowin.gov.in on Thursday, days ahead of a wider roll-out.

articles.title: People are struggling to get vaccine appointments. A 14-year-old stepped in to help. - The Washington Post
articles.description: A high school freshman created a team of volunteers to help hundreds of people register for their shots as opportunities to get vaccinated remain elusive.
articles.content:
Hopefully, the process doesnt take too long, because Benjamin has to sleep.

articles.title: Oregon Health Authority reports 32 new COVID-19 related deaths, 437 new cases - KPTV.com
articles.description: PORTLAND, OR (KPTV) – The Oregon Health Authority reported 32 new COVID-19 related deaths on Wednesday. That brings the state’s total number of deaths to 2,194.
